Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In films , the absorption spectra of PzNDTDTBT and PzNDTDTBO are similar to those in solution , with obvious red - shifts ( 56-68 nm ) of their absorption maxima as shown in Figure 3b , which is a common phenomenon for conjugated polymers , owing to the aggregation of the conjugated polymer main chains in the solid films.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PzNDTDTBT |
| PzNDTDTBO |

The two "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are "PzNDTDTBT" and "PzNDTDTBO". They are mentioned as the materials whose absorption spectra are being discussed in the context of films and solution.

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PzNDTDTBT |
| PzNDTDTBO |

The two entities "PzNDTDTBT" and "PzNDTDTBO" are the only clear "Material Name" entities in the paragraph. The other terms such as "films", "solution", and "conjugated polymer main chains" are not material names, but rather describe the physical states or properties of the materials.
